text:
-8-
January 61 - Young man wishes position in ETV as writer, announcer or
production assistant. Especially interested in drama on TV. Has worked
in both radio and TV. Received experience in educational broadcasting
in radio. Single,. 25, A.B. Location open. $70/wk.
January 62 * Young man with M.A.. (Syracuse), desires a position as prog¬
ramming assistant, production assistant; assistant director. Wants a
University-owned station. Can teach in conjunction with duties. Married,
24, Prefers Chicago area, does not want to go South. $4500.
January 63 - Pioneer in Radio-TV Educational station operation field de¬
sires change to college field. Has teaching and administrative credentials,
first class radio-telephone operators license, college teaching experience,
years of radio-TV technical operation, installation experience and the
know-how to set up and run a large department. Wants Chief Engineer
or technical director's position. Male, 50, married, M.A. Location open.
$7500.
January 64 - Recent graduate of TV school with a background in education,
newspaper and technical writing experience, desires radio-TV position as
continuity writer, news writing or production. Male, single, 43, A.B.
Location open. $3 00-400/month.
January 65 - Executive director, writer, producer - executive head of state
ETV agency now available due to Governor's veto of operating funds. Three
years TV production^direction; 7 years radio production-direction; film
qualifications; 8 years teaching radio, 2 teaching TV; Director Radio-TV
for state college 7 years , building program from 1 a week to 900 in a typical
year, with full responsibility for all broadcast activities. Family man
with ample reasons to keep nose to grindstone. Male, married, 38, M.A.
(with Ph.D. pending). Prefer western location but will go anywhere. $7000.
January 66 - Employed director-switcher desires opportunity to join educa¬
tional organization. Three years commercial experience in programming and
production, also commercial radio background. Male, single, 36, B.S.
(completing M.A.) Location open. $75/wk.
January 67 - Assistant program director and production manager of 3-station
TV working on M.S. in speech desires position in ETV in programming or
production. Knows phases of live local programming. Male, married, 27,
B.S. Will go anywhere except the deep South. $450/month.
